rdf:Description.dc:description: artemis academic and article resource page
rdf:Description.dc:title: artemis: resources
rdf:Description.dc:creator: justin tung

div.p: This section consists of short articles, presentations, and otherwise small documents.
The academic essays and projects presented should be of great use for students in both high school and university for information finding.

I hope these sites are helpful to you. The academic section is sorted by subjects and it based on electronic material I have been able to gather since April 1st 2001 when I first started large scale construction of the predecessor site of artemis. Please e-mail me if you would like more information regarding the resources I have provided.
